1.21.1.1.0.1: Fixed error requiring FCAP on NeoForge and added comments.
1.21.1.1.0.3: Renamed classes, reformated everything, and updated Gradle, Loom, and ModDevGradle.
1.21.1.21.1.1.2: Removed ConfigMaker and dependency of FCAP because will use Fzzy Config in mods.
1.21.1.21.1.1.3: Reverted Fzzy Config implementation due to issues, readded ConfigMaker, kept Maven fix.
1.21.1.21.1.1.4-beta1: Updated FCAP to 21.1.5, implemented some pack registering code, code cleanup, and more.
1.21.1.21.1.1.4: Updated FCAP to 21.1.5, NeoForge to 21.1.215, and Fabric Loader to 0.18.0, implemented some pack registering code, code cleanup, and more.
1.21.1.21.1.1.5: Changed pack registering code because of oversight involving Fabric.
1.21.1.21.1.1.6: Need to change config API to be able to have configs control packs.
1.21.1.21.1.1.7-beta2: Replaced string parameters that should only be set amount of values with enums.
1.21.1.21.1.1.7: Implemented Fzzy Config and other changes.
